fit.sentence: He is 16 and 6 foot 3, so if you are ordering for someone tall be cautious
remember to size up to make a shirt not feel skin tight 2-3" for tighter fit, 4 - 5 regular fit, 6+ baggy
but i have never bought a shirt that fits this well

color.sentence: Great shirt - bought it for my husband for a wedding, it wasn_ see-thru and a great color
Great purchase, materials great, husband is very happy
It's a little tight in the chest
This is a really nice looking shirt
It's a regular fabric dressy shirt with a denim look to it

material.sentence: Very comfortable, easy to wash with minimal ironing
